title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the OilSpillCleanupRobot project, including functional requirements (e.g., navigation, oil detection, collection mechanisms), non-functional requirements (e.g., autonomy, durability, safety), constraints (e.g., regulations, environmental factors), and success criteria (e.g., cleanup efficiency, cost-effectiveness).

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware components, software modules, communication protocols, and integration points. Consider the following aspects: 1) Modular design for easy maintenance and upgrades, 2) Scalability to handle varying spill sizes, 3) Robust error handling and fault tolerance, 4) Real-time monitoring and reporting capabilities, 5) Integration with external systems (e.g., mapping, weather data), 6) Security measures to prevent unauthorized access or tampering.

title: Develop Robot Hardware
description: Design and manufacture the physical robot components, including the chassis, motors, sensors, and other hardware components.

title: Develop Control Software
description: Develop the software for controlling the robot's movement, navigation, and oil cleanup operations.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for monitoring and controlling the robot remotely.

title: Implement Data Storage and Analytics
description: Design and implement a data storage solution for storing sensor data, mission logs, and other relevant data, and develop analytics tools for data analysis and reporting.

title: Establish Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Define and implement testing strategies, including unit testing, integration testing, and system testing, to ensure the robot's functionality and reliability.

title: Implement Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the robot's software and communication systems are secure and compliant with relevant regulations and industry standards.

title: Plan Deployment and Maintenance
description: Develop comprehensive strategies for deploying the robot in real-world oil spill scenarios, including transportation logistics, on-site setup procedures, and regular maintenance routines to ensure optimal performance and longevity.

title: Create Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and training materials for end-users, maintenance personnel, and other stakeholders.
